可以多选的下拉选择使用示例。.en-us: Example of a dropdown select with multiple selection enabled.

自由新增模式下，在输入框中输入内容后按下`enter`键、`tab`键，或点击下.en-us: In tags mode, after entering content in the input box, pressing the `enter` key, `tab` key, clicking an option in the dropdown, or blurring the select box will add a new option.

通过参数`size`控制下拉选择组件的尺寸规格。.en-us: Control the size of the select component with the `size` parameter.

通过参数`variant`控制下拉选择组件的形态变体。.en-us: Control the variant of the select component with the `variant` parameter.

通过参数`bordered`控制是否渲染下拉选择组件的边框。.en-us: Control whether to render the border of the select component with the `bordered` parameter.

通过参数`disabled`控制是否禁用当前组件。.en-us: Control whether to disable the component with the `disabled` parameter.

通过参数`readOnly`控制下拉选择框是否呈现只读状态。.en-us: Control whether the select box is read-only with the `readOnly` parameter.

通过参数`prefix`设置选择框内嵌前缀内容。.en-us: Set embedded prefix content in the select box with the `prefix` parameter.

通过参数`suffixIcon`设置选择框内嵌后缀图标。.en-us: Set the suffix icon in the select box with the `suffixIcon` parameter.

通过参数`status`控制下拉选择框强制校验状态显示。.en-us: Control forced validation state display with the `status` parameter.

通过参数`allowClear`控制是否允许清空已选项。.en-us: Control whether clearing selected items is allowed with the `allowClear` parameter.

通过参数`maxTagCount`控制下拉选择组件的最大可选项数。.en-us: Control the maximum number of displayed selected items with the `maxTagCount` parameter.

通过参数`maxCount`控制下拉选择组件的最大可选项数。.en-us: Control the maximum number of selectable items with the `maxCount` parameter.

选项的`disabled`可用于控制是否禁用对应选项。.en-us: The option `disabled` can be used to control whether the option is disabled.

参数`options`可直接传入可选值数组快捷构建常规下拉选择功能。.en-us: The `options` parameter can directly take an array of values to quickly build a standard select.

特殊的色带选择模式.en-us: A special color band select mode.

为下拉菜单设置额外的顶部或底部扩展组件型内容.en-us: Set additional top or bottom addon content for the dropdown menu.

可自定义下拉选择框无选项时的提示内容。.en-us: Customize the prompt when the select has no options.

设置下拉选择菜单的像素高度。.en-us: Set the height of the dropdown menu in pixels.

可设置不同的下拉选择菜单悬浮层展开方向。.en-us: Set the direction in which the dropdown menu expands.

可设置下拉选择菜单是否与选择框同宽，默认为`True`。设置为`False`时，.en-us: Control whether the dropdown menu matches the width of the select (default `True`). When `False`, virtual scrolling is disabled, which may affect performance with large datasets.

可设置下拉选择菜单悬浮展开层在文档流中锚定的位置。设置为`'body'`时，下拉.en-us: Set where the dropdown menu is anchored in the document flow. `'body'` renders to the body element, `'parent'` renders under the select element. Default: `'body'`. See [popup container settings](/popup-container) for details.

所有下拉选择框自带搜索选项的功能。.en-us: All select boxes have built-in search functionality.

控制选中后自动清空搜索框内容。.en-us: Control whether the search box is automatically cleared after selecting an item.

指定选项搜索目标字段.en-us: Specify the target field for option search.

可监听已选项值的变化情况，触发回调。.en-us: Listen to changes in selected values and trigger callbacks.

可监听搜索框输入值，触发回调。.en-us: Listen to search box input values and trigger callbacks.

通过回调监听属性`debounceValue`实现防抖版本的已输入搜索内容监听。.en-us: Listen to the `debounceValue` property to implement a debounced version of search value listening.

基于回调函数实现远程选项搜索加载功能。.en-us: Use callbacks to implement remote option loading with autoSpin.

基于回调函数实现多选框选项互斥功能。.en-us: Use callbacks to implement mutually exclusive options in multiple select.
